The image was shared on Facebook on Febr: 2021, and has been shared more than 1,400 times.
The Sinhala: language text superimposed on the image reads: "Demodara railway knot."
The image actually shows the Brusio spir: not the Demodara railway loop in Sri Lanka.
Various visual features: including the red train, steep hill beside the track, and a small road below, can be seen in both the misleading photo circulating on social media and the photo on MySwitzerland's website, confirming that the image is of the Brusio Spiral Viaduct.
